title: Rajakumari Ruby & Diamond Kada - A Touch of Royalty
materials: G Color). Handcrafted with exquisite Hyderabadi polish for a rich
features: Openwork design in gold forms delicate leafy patterns interspersed with diamonds. The centerpiece features a prominent square-cut ruby held in a bezel setting surrounded by a halo of brilliant-cut diamonds, adding a modern flair to a traditional form. The overall design evokes a sense of floral vines and elegant architecture.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi
or to add a touch of regal elegance to any modern attire.
description: This Kada blends traditional South Indian artistry with modern design aesthetics. The genuine ruby and sparkling diamonds symbolize love, passion, and prosperity. The openwork design adds a lightweight feel, making it comfortable for all-day wear. This heirloom-quality piece is a timeless investment.
